csirx_ss.h File Reference
IP » CSIRX CSL-FL » CSI RX Sub-System

This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of CSI RX SS. This also contains some related macros. More...

Detailed Description

This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of CSI RX SS. This also contains some related macros.
